Title: Increases the amount in the tax stabilization reserve fund to 5% of state fiscal year disbursements
Summary: Increases the amount in the tax stabilization reserve fund to 5% of state fiscal year disbursements.
LawCode: Amd ยง92, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to increasing the amount of money that may be maintained in the tax stabilization reserve fund
